labels.zoomallbuttontooltip: Click to show all of the features of the current tab
labels.exporttocsvbuttontooltip: Click to export the selected features of the current tab to CSV
labels.exporttocsvrecordcountwarning: You are currently only viewing a subset of the total records. Pressing 'OK' will export only those records currently displayed in the table. If you wish to export all of the records associated with this layer, click 'Cancel', zoom to the full extent of the records and try again.
